metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15266 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In GNU Libextractor 1.4, there is a Divide-By-Zero in EXTRACTOR_wav_extract_method in wav_extractor.c via a zero sample rate. It was discovered that Libextractor incorrectly handled zero sample rate. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: libextractor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
